wikipedia_page.main: Steffan Andrew Piolet (born 8 August 1988) is an English cricketer. He specialises in short format cricket and is a right-handed batsman and right-arm medium-pace bowler who has played over 100 matches for Sussex and Warwickshire

response: *Steffan Piolet, cricketer for Warwickshire County Cricket Club and Sussex County Cricket Club
